attributes.action: protect funding for Higher and Further Education after the next election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Neither the current government nor the opposition have gone on record to say that funding for Higher and Further Education will be protected come the next election.

In the current economic crisis, we should be investing in technologies that shall lead the country out of recession and away from the culture of call centres and other unskilled work.

Please confirm funding for HE and FE and protect jobs in the education sector and student places.
